title: Ventas CEO: Will Aggressively Expand Senior Housing
description: Debra Cafaro, chairman and CEO of Ventas, discusses the company’s ongoing expansion in senior housing. She tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on "The Close" that Ventas is focused on acquiring large senior living communities in high-demand U.S. markets. (Source: Bloomberg)
